textAfterTable: NWT BCBG Max Azria Hannah Color-Blocked Dress It doesn't get any more chic than this bright, color-blocked dress. It's perfect for an important day at the office or a well-attended gallery opening. NEW WITH TAG!    Retail price - $287 Canadian.  I bought on sale for $172 plus tax = $194.36   *(this sale price is marked on the tag see picture)* (Dress was purchased in Canada so the price will be higher than the US retail price) Round neck. Short sleeves. Solid top. Geometric seamed panel detail. Contrast faux-leather two-tone color-blocked skirt. A-line skirt. Exposed center back zipper closure. Woven: PES, Viscose, Cotton, Spandex. Crepe de chine: Polyester. Dry Clean. Imported.       Color -bright red combo Size - 8 Measurements Please read all measurements to ensure fit as I do not take returns Measurements are taken with garment laying flat Dress has some stretch! Bust -  38 inches Waist -  32 inches Hips -  42 inches (a-line) Length - 35 inches long from top of shoulder
